data.title: The Long Ryders
data.meta_description: Official Website of The Long Ryders. The Long Ryders Tour Dates for Europe and the USA.
data.text:
Tour Dates

2024

The Long Ryders play a special series of shows to celebrate both the 40th anniversary AND the new Cherry Red Box Set release of the album... Native Sons

October

10/10 - Oran Mor, Glasgow (UK) - Tickets

11/10 - Future Yard, Birkenhead (UK) - Tickets

12/10 - The Old Woolen, Leeds (UK) - Tickets

13/10 - Band on the Wall, Manchester (UK) - Tickets

14/10 - Metronome, Nottingham (UK) - Tickets

15/10 - The Fleece, Bristol (UK) - Tickets

16/10 - 229, London (UK) - Tickets

17/10 - Ropetackle Arts Centre, Shoreham By Sea (UK) - Tickets

18/10 - The Piper, Hastings (UK) - Tickets

19/10 - Ramblin Roots Festival, Utrecht (NL) - Tickets

20/10 - Metropool, Hengelo (NL) - Tickets

22/10 - Medley, MalmÃ¶ (SE) - Tickets

24/10 - Odal Rock Club, Austvatn (NO) - Tickets

25/10 - BlÃ¥, Oslo (NO)

26/10 - Melodybox, Stockholm (SE) - Tickets

For news on future tour dates, music releases and apperances please sign up for The Long Ryders Newsletter.

You can also follow The Long Ryders official social accounts on Facebook, Instagram and X(Twitter).

North American Bookings:

For North American Bookings of The Long Ryders please contact Brad Madison at Mongrel Music - brad@mongrelm.com

European Bookings:

To book The Long Ryders for Europe please contact Diego at Otis Tours - diego@otistours.com

Interviews and Press:

Matt Ingham at Cherry Red Records: matti@cherryred.co.uk / 0208 996 3120

Native Sons 3CD Box Set

Coming in January, the long-awaited expanded edition of Native Sons. Compiled in conjunction with the band, this new 3CD edition contains the original album alongside a raft of demos, B-sides, and a scorching live recording from 1985.

Pre-order NOW from Cherry Red Records at cherryred.co/NativeSons

Newsletter

Sign up for The Long Ryders Newsletter below for all the latest from the band - Including details on future tour dates.
